scripts.bump: npm run bump:workspaces && npm run bump:non-workspaces
scripts.bump:non-workspaces: find . -name package.json -not -path "./package.json" -and -not -path "*/node_modules/*" -not -path "*/07.advanced-web-chat-apps/*" $(jq -r '.workspaces | map("-and -not -path " + . + "/package.json") | join(" ")' ./package.json) | xargs dirname | xargs -I {} sh -c 'cd {} && npm run bump'
